articles.author: Leslie Josephs
articles.title: American Airlines' new CEO vows reliability as massive peak travel season kicks off - CNBC
articles.description: Airlines have struggled with a surge in demand that materialized faster than they expected.
articles.content:
American Airlines' new CEO Robert Isom is aiming for one thing this summer: reliability.
The airline grew faster than its large competitors last year and occasionally passengers faced widespread dis… [+4277 chars]

articles.title: Meet Indian-origin American Raja Chari who will soon return from space - The Federal
articles.description: Indian-origin astronaut Raja Chari will return to Earth from the International Space Station (ISS) later his month. The 44-year-old is the commander of the NASA SpaceX Crew-3 mission to the ISS.
articles.content:
Indian-origin astronaut Raja Chari will return to Earth from the International Space Station (ISS) later his month. The 44-year-old is the commander of the NASA SpaceX Crew-3 mission to the ISS.

articles.title: Americans rush to file taxes ahead of April 18 deadline - CBS Evening News
articles.description: As the deadline to file taxes approaches, the IRS continues to deal with a massive backlog and staffing shortages. Debra Alfarone reports."CBS Weekend News" ...
